abstract: Steve Burke will become the chief executive of NBC Universal once Jeff Zucker steps aside, Comcast and General Electric announced Sunday.
snippet: Steve Burke will become the chief executive of NBC Universal once Jeff Zucker steps aside, Comcast and General Electric announced Sunday.
lead_paragraph: Steve Burke will become the chief executive of NBC Universal once Jeff Zucker steps aside, Comcast and General Electric announced on Sunday.

headline.main: Burke to Succeed Zucker at NBC Universal
